item.title: We have formed a new global partnership with @AxelSpringer and its news products. Real-time information from @politico, @BusinessInsider, European pro...
item.description:
We have formed a new global partnership with @AxelSpringer and its news products.

Real-time information from @politico, @BusinessInsider, European properties @BILD and @welt, and other publications will soon be available to ChatGPT users.

ChatGPT’s answers to user queries will… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734940445824937993

item.title: Our Safety Systems team is on the frontlines of ensuring the safety and reliability of our AI models in the real world today. Learn about the team’s ...
item.description:
Our Safety Systems team is on the frontlines of ensuring the safety and reliability of our AI models in the real world today.

Learn about the team’s vision, challenges, and structure and see how you can be part of making AI safer and more beneficial for society.… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732103075144532197

item.title: Sam Altman is back as CEO, Mira Murati as CTO and Greg Brockman as President. OpenAI has a new initial board. Messages from @sama and board chair @bta...
item.description: Sam Altman is back as CEO, Mira Murati as CTO and Greg Brockman as President. OpenAI has a new initial board. Messages from @sama and board chair @btaylor https://openai.com/blog/sam-altman-returns-as-ceo-openai-has-a-new-initial-board
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: OpenAI is nothing without its people
item.description:
OpenAI is nothing without its people


Greg Brockman: we are so back
item.author: OpenAI

item.description:
❤️


Sam Altman: i love openai, and everything i’ve done over the past few days has been in service of keeping this team and its mission together. when i decided to join msft on sun evening, it was clear that was the best path for me and the team. with the new board and w satya’s support, i’m… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1727207458324848883
item.author: OpenAI

item.description:
❤️


Greg Brockman: Returning to OpenAI & getting back to coding tonight.
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We have reached an agreement in principle for Sam Altman to return to OpenAI as CEO with a new initial board of Bret Taylor (Chair), Larry Summers, an...
item.description:
We have reached an agreement in principle for Sam Altman to return to OpenAI as CEO with a new initial board of Bret Taylor (Chair), Larry Summers, and Adam D'Angelo.

We are collaborating to figure out the details. Thank you so much for your patience through this.
item.author: OpenAI

item.description:
ChatGPT with voice is now available to all free users. Download the app on your phone and tap the headphones icon to start a conversation.

Sound on 🔊

item.title: We're rolling out new features and improvements that developers have been asking for: 1. Our new model GPT-4 Turbo supports 128K context and has fresh...
item.description:
We're rolling out new features and improvements that developers have been asking for:

1. Our new model GPT-4 Turbo supports 128K context and has fresher knowledge than GPT-4. Its input and output tokens are respectively 3× and 2× less expensive than GPT-4. It’s available now to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1721596740024078340
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: Re Plus and Enterprise users can start creating GPTs this week at http://chatgpt.com/create. Later this month, we’ll launch the GPT Store, so people ...
item.description:
Re Plus and Enterprise users can start creating GPTs this week at http://chatgpt.com/create.

Later this month, we’ll launch the GPT Store, so people can feature and make money from their GPTs. We plan to offer GPTs to more users soon.
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: GPTs are a new way for anyone to create a tailored version of ChatGPT to be more helpful in their daily life, at specific tasks, at work, or at home ...
item.description: GPTs are a new way for anyone to create a tailored version of ChatGPT to be more helpful in their daily life, at specific tasks, at work, or at home — and then share that creation with others. No code required. https://openai.com/blog/introducing-gpts

item.title: We are building a new Preparedness team to evaluate, forecast, and protect against the risks of highly-capable AI—from today's models to AGI. Goal: a...
item.description:
We are building a new Preparedness team to evaluate, forecast, and protect against the risks of highly-capable AI—from today's models to AGI.

Goal: a quantitative, evidence-based methodology, beyond what is accepted as possible: https://openai.com/blog/frontier-risk-and-preparedness
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: Re The Frontier Model Forum is an industry body co-founded with @AnthropicAI, @Google and @Microsoft. We will focus on three key areas within AI safet...
item.description:
Re The Frontier Model Forum is an industry body co-founded with @AnthropicAI, @Google and @Microsoft. We will focus on three key areas within AI safety over the next year:

- Identifying best practices
- Advancing AI safety research
- Facilitating information sharing among companies… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1717176701384577447
